com.aloqa.trax.shared.coordref
Class WGS84

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.coordref.CoordinateReferenceSystem
      com.aloqa.trax.shared.coordref.WGS84

public class WGS84
extends CoordinateReferenceSystem

This implementation of CoordinateReferenceSystem is based on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid and geographical coordinates. The values of Coord - objects are handled as follows: the x-value is interpreted as latitude, the y-value as longitude and the z-value as height in meters over sea level.
